body.name: Garnier Fructis Pure Clean Purifying Shampoo, Silicone-Free, 12.5 Fl Oz, 1 Count (Packaging May Vary)

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Cradle to Cradle Certified products are made with safer materials and responsible processes to positively impact people and our planet. GOLD ACHIEVEMENT LEVEL

features: Remove up to 100% of residue with our lightweight shampoo and purify your hair for beautiful, softer strands at every wash
Infused with aloe extract plus Vitamins B3 & B6, our shampoo and conditioner system cleanses and hydrates for clean, healthy hair with no weigh-down and gentle for everyday use for all hair types
Garnier is committed to Greener Beauty - our bottles excluding pumps and caps are made of 100% Recycled Plastic
Leaping Bunny certified, Cruelty Free and Vegan
body.description: Hair is almost entirely made up of protein, which gives hair its strength. ALL NEW, paraben-free Fructis formulas with Active Fruit Protein, an exclusive combination of citrus protein, Vitamins B3 & B6, fruit & plant-derived extracts and strengthening conditioners, are designed for healthier, stronger hair. 97% biodegradable and silicone-free Fructis Pure Clean Shampoo with Citrus Extract provides lightweight daily refreshment to normal, oily hair. Helps fight urban aggressors by removing daily pollutants such as dirt and oils from hair. Hair feels fresh with no heavy residue and no build up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells great and can't beat the price
reviews.reviewText: Garnier Fructis Shampoo has become a staple in my hair care routine, and for good reason. This shampoo not only cleanses effectively but also leaves my hair feeling incredibly fresh and revitalized. The fruity fragrance is delightful and lingers, providing a burst of freshness throughout the day. I have noticed a significant improvement in the overall health of my hair since using this shampoo regularly. The formula is gentle yet effective, removing impurities without stripping away natural oils, leaving my hair clean, soft, and manageable. It also tackles frizz and adds a healthy shine to my locks. The affordability of Garnier Fructis Shampoo makes it a fantastic value for the quality it delivers. I appreciate that it caters to various hair types, making it suitable for a wide range of users. Overall, this shampoo is a reliable and affordable choice for those looking to achieve clean, healthy, and great-smelling hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I've finally found a new shampoo that works for my hair!!
reviews.reviewText: This is my first time trying out this shampoo and I love it! Not only does it smell good, it's made my hair incredibly soft and shiny. I immediately started looking for the conditioner to go with it. This shampoo has worked better than the last 2 I've tried so I'm definitely going to be a repeat buyer. So glad I chose to buy this one because not only is it cheaper than the ones I've been purchasing and tried but it also works better with my hair, it's so clean an soft. If your reading this review just get it and try it out I'm glad I did.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars cleans well and is gentle plus it removes residue from other products
reviews.reviewText: A top-notch hair care product at an excellent price.Pure and gentle cleanSoft hair with a nice smell after dryingWill purchase this shampoo aain

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Helps with breakage.
reviews.reviewText: I've used this for about a year for my hair. Smells great and I've noticed less hair in the drain. Everytime I switch shampoos i notice more breakage and end up going back to this.. I wish they had more scents available to switch it up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like this product as it has wonderful fragrance and great to have it delivered and price is right.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Its okay if you live in a place with decent water quality
reviews.reviewText: The purpose of this shampoo is to remove residue, particularly if you have hard water but that's only up to a. certain extent. I took this with me to Thailand knowing how bad the water quality is (since I lived there before) and during my two months stay this shampoo didn't help much and hair loss was inevitable. My scalp was still itchy despite using this. I'll give it a try when I'm back in the states.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s cheap yes, but this shampoo smells so good lathers well and makes my hair feel clean. The smell lasts for days on my long hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars a remarkable addition to my hair care routine
reviews.reviewText: I recently had the pleasure of trying Garnier Fructis Pure Clean Purifying Shampoo, and I can confidently say it's a fantastic addition to my hair care routine. This shampoo has surpassed my expectations in numerous ways, and I'd like to share why I believe it's such a remarkable product:Efficient Residue Removal: This shampoo is a game-changer when it comes to removing residue from my hair. After each wash, my hair feels incredibly clean, soft, and refreshed. It truly lives up to the promise of purifying the hair.Nourishing Formula: What sets Garnier Fructis Pure Clean apart is its infusion of aloe extract, Vitamins B3 & B6. Not only does it cleanse effectively, but it also hydrates and nurtures my hair, leaving it healthy and vibrant. The best part? There's no heavy, greasy feeling – just clean, revitalized strands.Versatile and Gentle: It's gentle enough for daily use and suitable for all hair types. Whether I'm washing my hair every day or just a few times a week, I can depend on this shampoo to provide a consistent and reliable clean.Eco-Friendly Commitment: I appreciate Garnier's commitment to Greener Beauty. The use of 100% Recycled Plastic for their bottles is a step in the right direction to reduce environmental impact. It's heartening to see a brand dedicated to sustainable practices.Free from Harsh Chemicals: The fact that this shampoo is paraben-free and silicone-free is a significant advantage. It gives me peace of mind, knowing that I'm not subjecting my hair to harsh or unnecessary chemicals.Cruelty-Free and Vegan: The Leaping Bunny certification and vegan status further highlight Garnier's commitment to ethical and cruelty-free practices. It's a reassuring aspect for conscientious consumers like myself.In conclusion, Garnier Fructis Pure Clean Purifying Shampoo is a remarkable addition to my hair care routine. Its efficient residue removal, nourishing formula, and eco-friendly commitments make it a top choice. I've experienced fantastic results, and I wholeheartedly recommend it to anyone in search of a reliable, eco-conscious shampoo that leaves hair clean, soft, and revitalized. Garnier's dedication to purity, sustainability, and ethical practices truly shine through in this product. Your hair will thank you for it!

My whole family loves this shampoo. I would definitely recommend it and the quality is wonderful. My daughter has oily hair and this works perfect for her. It does not feel greasy after washing it and it lathers great. It is a repeat buy for us for sure.
The media could not be loaded. Fast delivery, but the product itself is not good—at least the package.The seal was opened, and the bottle was leaking everywhere,,,, and it was sticky.

reviews.reviewTitle: Solid choice for thin, greasy hair
reviews.reviewText: As a guy with thin, greasy hair, this product does an adequate job of making me presentable as a human being. My hair will survive for about 12 hours before it gets gross again, and touching it makes me embarrassed to be seen in public. Would love a solution that lasted longer, but until I find it, Fructis Pure Clean is my head jam of choice.

reviews.reviewTitle: Itchy scalp after using it for a while
reviews.reviewText: I bought this shampoo because it claims to be an eco friendly shampoo.My hair and scalp tends to get oily after a day of not shampooing.So I wash my hair everyday with this shampoo. Even so my scalp become very itchy I don't know what causing it.I washed my hair again with my almost empty head and shoulder shampoo. The itchiness is immediately gone.The H&S is done and I'm using Dove shampoo, also no itchy reaction from these two brands. Well too bad, I was hoping to be more eco friendly.
Très bon shampooing et odeur agréable
